name: Witchy Memory: A Short Visual Novel
name_original: Witchy Memory: A Short Visual Novel
description:
(Play the game online in your browser:)   https://cloudnovel.net/MuiYuiTokito/novel/witchy-memory (The game's Mac and Windows build is out now! An Android build/Google Play release may also happen in May!) ✿ PLOT ✿

You, Qalini are a witch who went to earth to revive your lover's memories that were unfortunately lost after an incident both of you made back at your hometown. She forgot she was a witch and thinks she is human. Suddenly, you find a potion that allows you to track Meadow's memories. 

Will you be able to revive them?

✿ FEATURES ✿

  - 4 endings
- 3 CGs
- 4,289 words 
- Original user interface and character sprites
- 1 love interest to pursue and befriend!

✿ CAST✿ ✿ CREDITS✿

Directed, written, and developed by Ra~Chan

Designed, co-developed, and edited by ThatOtaku

Art by Lilly @AquariumAesthetic [Sprite/Character Design], Mage [Background] and Naru [CG]

Co-written and proofread by Everlight and UrbainLegend

✿Additional Credits✿

Other Art by NoranekoGames[Background], Sonya[Buttons], Lefthandman12[Sushi], Reino and Angelgames731[Phones]

Sounds by Keys Of Moon[Music] and Zapsplat[SFX]

The engine used to make this game: CloudNovel

✿Special Thanks✿

Arimia for donating us 1000 CloudNovel points
